加度素說：“國際米蘭配得上這場勝利，但假如比賽以0-0結束，對AC米蘭來說肯定會有一些更積極的東西。我們踢了一場我們不太喜歡的足球風格的比賽，但我們完成的很好。我們能夠更好地完成傳球和反擊。從賽季開始至今，我的球隊沒有堅持過90分鐘（不失球），這次我們堅持住了，我們甚至為此佈置了很多防守隊員。唯一遺憾的是，在最後15分鐘裡，我們有許多的反擊機會，但可惜沒能做到更多。我們在完成了4或5次攔截並且成功地解除了他們的入球機會，但在最後一球上我們犯了錯，這是最大的遺憾。總括來說，必須承認國米做得比我們更多。”



“查漢奴古看起來非常累了，我不想去改變戰術體系，因為除了佈置球員以外，我們直到那時（伊卡迪絕殺）都沒有遭受到真正的考驗。試圖用中堅突入到對方禁區是毫無意義的，所以我更喜歡用古當尼利用球場寬度給這個位置帶來新的能量。國際身強體壯，我們則有著其他素質。我們嘗試去對抗他們的身體，我真的很喜歡這種方式，去踢一種我們不習慣的足球。我們也有機會，但毫無疑問，國際的機會更多。”


撚帥係諗住打死一招贏就贏唔贏就守和

Donadoni to replace Gattuso at Milan?

There are growing reports Milan are working to fire Coach Gennaro Gattuso and replace him with Roberto Donadoni.

The Rossoneri tactician’s position was put back in doubt after a last-gasp 1-0 defeat to Inter in the Derby della Madonnina.

More than the result, it was the performance, lack of initiative and overly-negative approach that reportedly irritated the Milan hierarchy.

According to La Gazzetta dello Sport and Sportitalia, director Leonardo is particularly eager to wield the axe on Gattuso and bring in a more experienced tactician.

It’s claimed Donadoni is the favourite, a free agent after his contract with Bologna expired over the summer.

Like Gattuso, he is a former member of the squad that won every trophy and represents the old-school Milan image.

Sportitalia even go so far as to suggest Riccardo Montolivo and his agent are helping to push the club towards choosing Donadoni.

Donadoni to replace Gattuso at Milan?

There are growing reports Milan are working to fire Coach Gennaro Gattuso and replace him with Roberto Donadoni.

The Rossoneri tactician’s position was put back in doubt after a last-gasp 1-0 defeat to Inter in the Derby della Madonnina.

More than the result, it was the performance, lack of initiative and overly-negative approach that reportedly irritated the Milan hierarchy.

According to La Gazzetta dello Sport and Sportitalia, director Leonardo is particularly eager to wield the axe on Gattuso and bring in a more experienced tactician.

It’s claimed Donadoni is the favourite, a free agent after his contract with Bologna expired over the summer.

Like Gattuso, he is a former member of the squad that won every trophy and represents the old-school Milan image.

Sportitalia even go so far as to suggest Riccardo Montolivo and his agent are helping to push the club towards choosing Donadoni.

Bakayoko: ‘I’ll prove myself’

Milan midfielder Tiemoué Bakayoko assures “with time you’ll see” the player who impressed at Monaco.

The Frenchman had a difficult season at Chelsea last term, and was loaned out to the Rossoneri.

His performances have been unimpressive though, with some suggestions he could even be sent back to west London.

“I’ve been very well received,” Bakayoko assured in the Press conference ahead of tomorrow’s Real Betis game.

“It’s a good group and my integration has gone very well, I’m trying to adapt the way I play. The best of me has yet to come and it’d be better to play a bit more, but I’m already seeing improvements.

“A lot of things have changed, it’s a new league and a new style of football but I’m trying to give my best.

“With time you’ll see the Bakayoko you talk about.”
